review: - high build quality, includes all needed accessories- very stable WIFI, compared to Chinese Android sticks- 1080p picture quality is very good- bluetooth remote works well, no line of sight needed- much more functional than a Chromecast, since it can run without being initiated by another device, also allows you to install many Android apps and like the Chromecast fling content from tablets/phones- Ability to sideload apps without much effort is great- recommend getting these for each of your TVs
author: Jude Dsouza

review: I just love it will be ordering other soon.
author: vicky henley

review: Amazon Fire TV Stick needs so many improvements!!
author: Willie R Logan

review: Have not used it much since receiving it, but setup was very easy and from what little I have worked with it, it is great.
author: Sue "TeddySue"

review: What's not to love about the Fire Stick? Turns any TV with an HDMI port into a smart TV and takes up almost no space.
author: Walter

review: Doesn't get much better than free with subscription to Sling TV!
author: Cara Ng

review: My family is really impressed. We use it much more than I thought.While there's plenty of video content for adults and kids, what I really like is the ability to play Amazon Music through the home-entertainment system. It also adds extra value to being a Prime member. I like the parental code key. It means the kids have to come ask me first if they can watch something. That way they aren't watching stuff without me knowing about it.
author: J.C.

review: Awesome product it knows my Amazon Prime information
author: Azodiac

review: This stick will catch a lot of people by surprise.  Once you stick it in, you'll be amazed at all the entertainment this holds.This surprisingly has a huge following of unofficial developers that create great apps you may not find with a lot of other devices such as the Chromecast or Roku.  Some of these apps include streaming of a lot of TV Shows and Movies (some not even available on Red Box!).Make the purchase and start saving money.  Also, great way to take advantage of your Amazon Prime membership if you already are one, this makes the membership much more valuable.
author: Terence Rivera
